name: Scarlet Rose Devotion
text: Through the bond of sisterhood, you can inspire your allies to overcome terrible threats.
prerequisites: Bodyguard, Combat Reflexes, Perform (oratory) 3 ranks, any good alignment.
benefit: Whenever an ally within 30 feet attempts a saving throw, you can attempt a DC 10 Perform (oratory) check as an immediate action. If you are successful, the ally gains a +2 morale bonus on her saving throw. This ability has no effect if your ally cannot hear you speak or understand your words.
text_zh: 通过姊妹间的联系，你可以鼓舞你的盟友克服恐怖的威胁。
prerequisites_zh: 保镖（Bodyguard）APG；战斗反射（Combat Reflexes）；表演(演讲)3级；任意善良阵营。
benefit_zh: 每当你30尺内的盟友进行1次豁免检定时,你可以用一个直觉动作进行一次DC10的表演(演讲)检定。如果你成功了,盟友在豁免检定上获得+2的士气加值。这个能力在你队友无法听见或者理解你的话时不会生效。
